original_text: Then he must wash his clothes and he must wash his body with water. After that, he can come into the camp, but he will not be clean until the evening.
korean_text: 제사장은 자기의 옷을 빨고 물로 몸을 씻은 후에 진영에 들어갈 것이라 그는 저녁까지 부정하리라

sentences.original_text: Then he must wash his clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 자기 옷을 씻어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and he must wash his body with water
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 물로 자기 몸을 씻어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: he can come into the camp
but he will not be clean
